title: No WaitDelay on Claude/Gemini agents â€” orphan processes on context cancel
description:
## Location
- internal/agent/claude.go (missing cmd.WaitDelay)
- internal/agent/gemini.go (missing cmd.WaitDelay)
- Contrast: codex.go:88 and opencode.go:73 DO set cmd.WaitDelay = 5 * time.Second

## Problem
Without WaitDelay, SIGKILL fires immediately on context cancel. Node.js child processes (e.g. MCP servers) may not be in the process group yet, leaving orphans holding pipes open.

Codex and OpenCode already have this fix. Claude and Gemini do not.

## Fix
Add cmd.WaitDelay = 5 * time.Second to claude.go and gemini.go, matching codex.go and opencode.go.
